properties.name: fill-color
properties.description: Color which is filled into polygon.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Whether polygon is visible or not.

events.name: double-click
events.description: Raised when polygon is doubly clicked.

events.name: right-click
events.description: Raised when polygon is right clicked.

events.name: mouse-over
events.description: Raised when mouse moves over polygon.

events.name: mouse-move
events.description: Raised when mouse moves on polygon.

events.name: mouse-down
events.description: Raised when mouse is pressed down to polygon.

events.name: mouse-up
events.description: Raised when mouse is released from polygon.
